ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] Mid-level items for plats
ygData.msgSnippet: Unfortunately, the mech lockpicks don t do anything over regular lockpicks.  I tried it myself with a door in freeport.  I practiced until I could just open
ygData.messageBody:
Unfortunately, the mech lockpicks don't do anything over regular
lockpicks. I tried it myself with a door in freeport. I practiced until I
could just open the door using mechanical lockpicks, then tried to use
regular lockpicks and the door opened. So, doesn't matter which you
use. Therefore, the mechanical lockpicks have no special ability that is
readily apparent. At least not as advertized by Verant. Before I found
this out, I was selling them for 40pp each. Now, I won't sell them until I
find out what good they are. As for spyglasses, 80pp is a normal price. I
also give them away to people that resurrect me :)


At 09:00 PM 3/5/00 -0500, you wrote:
>From: "Russ Wilcox" <rwilcox@...>
>
>What's the going price for mech lockpicks, cams, and especially spyglasses?
>Do any of these turn into moneymakers?
